title: PlayMyMusic
summary: PlayMyMusic is for android wear. User can control music from android watch.
description: Must-have app for your smart watch! PlayMyMusic is one of the best & most easiest ways to enjoy music on your phone as well as on your watch . Enjoy the high-quality mobile music playback experience. Easy to support all music & audio file formats. You can manage your musics easily. It is one of the most gorgeous and powerful music player for Android! Support formats:MP3, MP4,WAV,MID,OGGWhat’s different? –•	Easy to use minimalistic UI•	Bluetooth Low Energy Pairing•	Entire list of songs to be played right on your wrist!
descriptionHTML:
Must-have app for your smart watch! PlayMyMusic is one of the best & most easiest ways to enjoy music on your phone as well as on your watch . Enjoy the high-quality mobile music playback experience. Easy to support all music & audio file formats. You can manage your musics easily. It is one of the most gorgeous and powerful music player for Android!

Support formats:
MP3, MP4,WAV,MID,OGG

What’s different? –
• Easy to use minimalistic UI
• Bluetooth Low Energy Pairing
• Entire list of songs to be played right on your wrist!
comments: Cool app! Works well with mobile. Lists all songs and easy to play n control.
